PackageOracle.name: DA_ASSOCIATE_LOGON
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ASSOCIATE_LOGON
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.39.548716000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,system_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,system_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_associate_logon;

body.name: DA_ASSOCIATE_LOGON
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ASSOCIATE_LOGON
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.39.558774000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,system_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_associate_logon.add, parms=' || associate_id || '|' || logon_id || '|' || system_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_associate_logon a
(
a.associate_id
,a.logon_id
,a.system_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.associate_id
,add.logon_id
,add.system_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_associate_logon.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,associate_id IN NUMBER
,logon_id IN VARCHAR2
,system_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_associate_logon.del, parms=' || associate_id || '|' || logon_id || '|' || system_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_associate_logon a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.associate_id = del.associate_id
AND a.logon_id = del.logon_id
AND a.system_nm = del.system_nm
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_associate_logon.del');

END del;

END da_associate_logon;
